etri.sdn.controller

Class RestApiServerApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • org.restlet.Application
        • etri.sdn.controller.RestApiServerApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

     class RestApiServerApplication
extends org.restlet.Application
    This is a REST API server application class required to create a REST API Server ((RESTApiServer).
    Author:
    bjlee

      • getRouter

        public org.restlet.routing.Router getRouter()
        return the Router object associated with this application.
        Returns:
        Router object. The router object is created when createInboundRoot() is called.

      • createInboundRoot

        public org.restlet.Restlet createInboundRoot()
        create an inbound root object. The type of the object is Router, which is a subclass of Restlet.

        createInboundRoot in class org.restlet.Application
